name: Pong: Revived
description:
Need some retro gaming in your life? Pong: Revived is a remake of the classic 1972 arcade game by Atari for Mac. The mechanics of this game should need no explanation, but if you somehow haven't heard of Pong, it's a game where you have two paddles controlled by two players and a ball. Move your paddle to hit the ball. If you miss, your opponent scores a point. First to 10 wins. The mechanics are a lot like tennis, except the net doesn't actually do anything.

The game experience is highly customizable, including, but not limited to, colors, speeds, cheat codes, and backgrounds.
